anime.title: Attack on Titan
anime.description: Humanity lives within cities surrounded by enormous walls as a defense against the Titans, gigantic humanoid creatures.

anime.title: Demon Slayer
anime.description: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly.

anime.title: My Hero Academia
anime.description: A superhero-loving boy without any powers is determined to enroll in a prestigious hero academy and learn what it really means to be a hero.

anime.title: One Piece
anime.description: Follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew in order to find the greatest treasure ever left by the legendary Pirate, Gold Roger.

anime.title: Jujutsu Kaisen
anime.description: A boy swallows a cursed talisman and becomes cursed himself. He enters a shaman's school to be able to locate the demon's other body parts.

anime.title: Death Note
anime.description: An intelligent high school student goes on a secret crusade to eliminate criminals from the world after discovering a notebook capable of killing anyone.

anime.title: Naruto
anime.description: Naruto Uzumaki, a mischievous adolescent ninja, struggles as he searches for recognition and dreams of becoming the Hokage.

anime.title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
anime.description: Two brothers search for a Philosopher's Stone after an attempt to revive their deceased mother goes awry.

anime.title: Steins;Gate
anime.description: A group of friends discover a way to send messages to the past and alter the timeline, with dangerous consequences.

anime.title: Sword Art Online
anime.description: Players of a virtual reality MMORPG find themselves trapped in the game and must fight to escape.

anime.title: One Punch Man 3
anime.description: Third season of One Punch Man.

anime.title: Spy x Family Season 3
anime.description: Third season of Spy x Family.

anime.title: One Punch Man 3
anime.description: Third season of One Punch Man.
